name: Tax.io
description:
We proudly present you our new game Tax.io!

Tax.io is a classical top down view runner set in a futuristic, car-themed world.

Tax.io welcomes you! The objective of the game is to go through a colored area while avoiding traps and cargo trucks, and to collect coins along the way.

HOW TO PLAY: Swipe to control your car.

Game features:
- cool running game
- challenging enemies - easy car navigation
- reaction time test

Download and install Tax.io right now! Drive your crazy taxi, gain scores and avoid being killed by enemies – quite simple!
